notification.evidence.approved.title: Proof on {{day}} approved
notification.evidence.approved.content: Your proof submitted on {{day}} in the challenge '{{challengeName}}' has been approved. Keep it up!
notification.evidence.rejected.title: Proof on {{day}} rejected
notification.evidence.rejected.content: Your proof submitted on {{day}} in the challenge '{{challengeName}}' was rejected. Please check feedback and resubmit if needed.

notification.groupJoinChallenge.title: Your group has joined a challenge!

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?

hero.title: About GoBeyond
hero.subtitle: Changing the world through meaningful challenges

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: GoBeyond was created with the goal of connecting communities through challenges that bring positive value. We believe that small actions, when performed by many people, can create significant change for society and the environment.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Build communities of people who share the same passion and desire to create positive impact

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.description: Create meaningful challenges to drive change and personal development

impact.title: Create Impact
impact.description: Transform challenges into concrete actions that improve communities and the environment

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Passionate and dedicated people behind GoBeyond, constantly striving to bring the best experiences to the community.

values.title: Core Values
values.description: The principles that guide all our decisions and actions

responsibility.title: Social Responsibility
responsibility.description: We believe in creating positive impact for communities and the environment through all our activities.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continually seek new ways to solve problems and create value for users.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We build trust through openness, honesty, and clarity in all our operations.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe that strength comes from working together and learning from diverse perspectives.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.description: From the initial idea to a thriving growing community

beginning.title: Beginning
beginning.description: GoBeyond was formed from the idea of a group of young people passionate about creating positive change.

development.title: Development
development.description: The platform officially launched with basic features. The first user community was formed.

expansion.title: Expansion
expansion.description: GoBeyond grows strongly with many new features and an increasingly growing user community.

contact.title: Connect With Us
contact.description: We are always ready to listen to your feedback and accompany you on your journey to create positive change

address.title: Address
address.value: Hoa Lac Hi-tech Park, km 29, Thang Long Avenue, Hanoi
